text: Kadavoor Sivadasan (11 March 1932 â€“ 17 May 2019) was an Indian politician and trade unionist. He was a member of the Indian National Congress. He was elected as an member of the Kerala Legislative Assembly. In 1985, he represented the Indian government at the International Labour Organization (ILO) in Geneva. He was born in Kadavoor, Kollam. Sivadasan died on 17 May 2019 in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala. He was 87. ==References== Category:2019 deaths Category:1932 births Category:Politicians from Kerala Category:Trade unionists
title: Kadavoor Sivadasan
